mapper.sql: id, user_id, title, images, content, create_time, last_answer_time, fabulous_count, answer_count, look_count, status, del_flag
p.id, p.user_id, p.title, p.images, p.content, p.create_time, p.last_answer_time, p.fabulous_count, p.answer_count, p.look_count, p.status, p.del_flag, u.head_portrait, pts.name
mapper.select: SELECT FROM ppsg_discuss_post p left join s_user u on p.user_id = u.id left join ppsg_discuss_post_tag pt on p.id=pt.discuss_id left join ppsg_discuss_post_tags pts on pt.tag_id = pts.id where p.del_flag = 0 and pts.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ppsg_discuss_post ( user_id, title, images, content, create_time, last_answer_time, fabulous_count, answer_count, look_count, status, del_flag ) VALUE ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{images}, #{content}, #{createTime}, #{lastAnswerTime}, #{fabulousCount}, #{answerCount}, #{lookCount}, #{status}, #{delFlag} )
